QuestData.Title: The Conquest of Stone
QuestData.Description: In the Court of Bones, the Thunder King's sorcerers perform dark rituals.$B$BTo bolster their numbers, the Shan'ze soulrippers are imbuing ancient stone statues with stolen spirits from the living.$B$BAfter these stone conquerors are brought to life, they will be formidable opponents on the battlefield.$B$BWe must stop their ritual before these statues can be revived.
QuestData.LogDescription: Disrupt the Ancient Stone Conqueror ritual in the main temple at the Court of Bones.

Objectives.Objective: Disrupt the Ancient Stone Conqueror ritual
